title: Reporting - Does it work?
body: I dunno if anyone can actually answer this but I was wondering if there was a way to find out if your account is for some reason flagged and your reports therefore ignored. I feel as though I get verbally abused over the silliest things in games.. and I make reports, often with details about whats happened and despite the new system being in place I have never receieved any feedback about anything happening at all. It's beginning to get really disheartening. I can admit I make a LOT of reports but I've never made a false one. I also don't think my record can be too bad as I've never had any form of ban/restriction and have also recieved the skins for being a good member of the community.
